attributes.action: Encourage the BBC to change the weather map from that awful desert colour to green.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC weather map portrays the UK as a dry, barren, desolate area, instead of a green and pleasant land.

It cannot be beyond the imagination or capabilities of the BBC weather "physicist's" to come up with a weather map that shows the UK as green and not like the Sahara Desert.

Come on BBC - get it right !!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
